Entry.de-DE: Rebel Units are spawned from Cities with link(CONCEPT_FAMILY,2) with negative link(CONCEPT_OPINION_FAMILY,3). These Units will prefer to attack Units of the Nation from which they spawned. Rebel Units remember their oringinal link(CONCEPT_FAMILY), so Units of the same link(CONCEPT_FAMILY) receive a int(SAME_FAMILY_MODIFIER)%{ATTACKDEFENSE} combat modifier.)

Raiders emerge from Tribal Sites which have too many Units. A random number of the Tribe's Units are turned into Raiders, who target a nearby City at link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) or link(DIPLOMACY_TRUCE) with the Tribe. However, Raiders are always at link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) with all link(CONCEPT_NATION,2). (Tribes in link(CONCEPT_ALLIANCE_TRIBE,1) will never become Raiders.)
Barbarians occupy link(CONCEPT_CITY_SITE,2) like other link(CONCEPT_TRIBE,2), but they are in a permanent state of link(DIPLOMACY_WAR) with all link(CONCEPT_NATION,2).
